title: One-pot bacon, spinach and tomato pasta
moreInfo: A quick and easy one-pot pasta for all the family. Served sprinkled with parmesan cheese. Never have simple ingredients cooked quickly tasted so good.

title: Chocolate volcanoes
moreInfo: Paul's version of the classic chocolate fondant is all about timing

title: Spaghetti carbonara
moreInfo: Spaghetti carbonara is a super quick and easy pasta dish that's perfect for weeknight meals or special occasions.

title: Beef stroganoff
moreInfo: This classic creamy beef stroganoff recipe is made with mushrooms, smoked paprika and slices of pan-fried rump steak.

title: Sichuan-style sea bass
moreInfo: Asian-style seas bass with simple stir-fried vegetables - so healthy and full of flavour.
